(OOC: Hope you don't mind I changed the subject/thread)

> Tucson backs up =
and tries to face Lord Elder.
>
> " I owe Lord Elder my utmost gratitude. I=
f - you had not guarded the - Ark, all would - have been lost. I - thank yo=
u deeply for your
> loyalty, and - constant vigil over the Autobot vessel. =
Once I - figure out how to revive my comrades, I - will be sure they know o=
f your valliant efforts to - protect what is most precious to us. R - Rat T=
ap. You too, have - shown bravery in your actions. I owe you as much, if no=
t more of my loyalty to you. without - your help, I would not have gotten o=
ut of that fortress."

Lord elder looked almost embarrassed as Tuscon thank=
ed him. "I only
did what any Maximal would do for a comrade in arms." he sa=
id, a small
smile appearing on his face. "But before you thank me, let's ge=
t you
home first."

With a burst of power from the engines, flames burst fr=
om the VTOL
boosters and and lifted them off the ground. As they rose the s=
huttle
shook as the craft complained about damage from the rather rough
lan=
ding. However the shuttle quickly leveled out as Lord Elder turned
the ship=
 and put them on course back towards the Ark.

> "Not - at all. Lord Elder,=
 I - have one favor to ask you. I'd - like to pay my respects to Optimus - =
Prime once we arrive at the Ark. Do - I have permission to enter the Ark to=
 do so?"

"Of course Tuscon, we will all be entering the Ark." Elder said f=
rom
his seat, his voice somewhat distracted, "But make sure that you don't
=
disturb anything. It is very important that we leave everything as we
find =
it."

The shuttle rumbled a bit as the engines sputtered and ignited again,=

"That is if we make it back."

(TAG)

Preston
(Lord Elder)
